# Oblivki

## Example

```html
<amp-ad
  width="300"
  height="250"
  type="oblivki"
  data-use-a4a="true"
  data-block-key="XgSNxZnGpAmULblp9d23"
  src="https://oblivki.biz/amp_a4a?key=XgSNxZnGpAmULblp9d23"
>
</amp-ad>
```

## Configuration

For configuration details and to generate your tags, please contact support@oblivki.biz

Supported parameters:

-   `data-block-key`
